name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing and deploying high-performance cloud-native applications. Proficient in **Node.js**, **Python**, **AWS**, and **Azure**, with strong expertise in microservices architecture, CI/CD, and event-driven systems. Skilled in creating scalable backend systems utilizing technologies such as **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **CloudFormation**. Proficient in designing RESTful APIs and working with databases including **Postgres** and **DynamoDB**. Experienced in implementing efficient automation strategies using **Jenkins** for CI/CD processes.
Brings a well-rounded background in leading enterprise platform development incorporating AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics, complemented by a focus on building secure solutions meeting compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about driving impactful technology solutions while ensuring maintainability and performance.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable backend solutions using **Node.js** and **Python** (FastAPI), ensuring optimal performance and security for high-traffic applications in healthcare and finance.
• Developed robust cloud architectures using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to orchestrate containerized applications, improving deployment efficiency by **30%**.
• Established CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Jenkins** and **Terraform**, ensuring seamless integration and deployment processes, reducing downtime by **20%** and maintaining high availability.
• Managed data persistence and retrieval with **Postgres** and **DynamoDB**, optimizing queries for large-scale data processing with a reduction in latency by **40%**.
• Implemented microservices architectures utilizing **REST** APIs, enabling independent scaling and development of services that improved feature deployment speed by **50%**.
• Automated cloud infrastructure with **CloudFormation** and **ARM templates**, leading to consistent and repeatable deployments across environments, increasing operational reliability.
• Ensured code quality and maintainability through rigorous testing using frameworks such as **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest**, covering **90%** of codebase with unit and integration tests.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to integrate third-party services and improve overall system interoperability, enhancing user experience in healthcare applications.
• Analyzed application performance metrics and implemented monitoring solutions using cloud services, achieving **99.9%** uptime across all backend systems.
• Developed efficient data processing pipelines, decreasing data latency by **35%** through the integration of **Pub/Sub** messaging systems.

Utilized **Node.js** and **Python** for building robust backend systems, ensuring adherence to microservices architecture principles and enhancing scalability for high-level financial applications.
Implemented cloud solutions using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for improved deployment and management of applications, achieving a **30%** reduction in operational costs.
Designed and maintained asynchronous communication protocols through **REST** APIs and integrated **Docker** containers with **Kubernetes** orchestration to ensure reliable application delivery across environments.
Contributed to CI/CD processes utilizing **Jenkins** and **Terraform**, resulting in increased deployment frequency by **40%** and reduced lead time for changes.
Created extensive database solutions with **Postgres** and **DynamoDB**, managing transaction volumes exceeding **1 million** entries per day while optimizing read/write operations.
Applied modern event-driven architectures with **Pub/Sub** systems to enhance real-time processing capabilities for transactions and alerts, facilitating faster compliance workflows.
Conducted cross-functional collaboration to streamline product development and integrate **Go** and other backend languages as needed, leading to a smoother development lifecycle and increased team efficiency.
Ensured high standards of code quality and performance metrics, mentoring junior engineers in best practices for backend development and cloud technologies.

Developed and optimized backend services using **Node.js** and **Python**, ensuring high performance and scalability, especially in critical modules such as checkout and order fulfillment, while managing traffic loads exceeding **10,000** requests per minute.
Engineered cloud solutions using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, implementing **Docker** for containerization and **Kubernetes** for orchestration to maintain availability and manage seamless deployments across environments.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins**, ensuring continuous integration and deployment processes that reduced release times by **30%** and improved deployment frequency.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** for structured data storage to enhance query performance, achieving database response times under **100ms** for high-traffic e-commerce applications.
Automated infrastructure provisioning with **Terraform** and **CloudFormation**, deploying multi-tier applications to simplify resource management and scalability, which led to a **40%** decrease in infrastructure costs.
Applied RESTful architecture for microservices communication, allowing modular development that accelerated feature releases by **25%** without compromising system reliability.
Created and maintained Pub/Sub messaging systems to support asynchronous communication within distributed systems, ensuring real-time updates and minimal latency during peak load times.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure system security through role-based access control and data protection measures, ensuring **GDPR** compliance and safeguarding customer data.
Optimized cloud costs and performance, consistently reviewing cloud resource utilization metrics to achieve a reduction in costs by **15%** while maintaining system performance and reliability.
